name: rillettes
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
meat that has been cut into small pieces, cooked very slowly in its own fat, and then pressed and stored covered with fat in a container: Rillettes are similar to pâté but are coarser in texture. Remove the rillettes from the fridge about an hour before you plan to eat them.
More examplesFewer examplesYou need to season well to make good rillettes.Serve the rillettes with the figs, salad, and baguette or sourdough.Rillettes should be soft enough to spoon out, so remember to remove the jar several hours before dinner.
